name: Chopper Defence - ZX Spectrum homebrew
description:
NOTE: THIS RUNS ON A ZX SPECTRUM COMPUTER and you'll need an EMULATOR or the real thing to run it on. 

THIS DOES NOT PLAY ON REGULAR PC!

Aliens are invading! Again! You've been given the job of flying the space defence chopper to keep them from taking over the planet. It's equipped with the latest state of the art weaponry (lasers!) and it's Earth's only hope!

Save the parachuting human pilots in your defence chopper and defeat each wave of enemies to progress to the next level. 

Keyboard controls (redefinable from main menu):

  • Q - Fly up
  • O - Left
  • P - Right
  • SPACE - Fire (hold it down if you like)
  • H - Toggle pause

Install instructions:

Save the .tap file somewhere you can get to easily. Fire up your ZX Spectrum emulator and load the .tap file. I recommend Retro Virtual Machine as an emulator - it's super polished and reliable. Get it free here https://www.retrovirtualmachine.org/en/

Made by me, PsychicParrot (Jeff Murray), in 2022 using MPAGD. Thanks to Jonathan Cauldwell, Quantum Sheep and YOU for keeping the Speccy dream alive!
